name: Icons8 Background Remover
description:
Remove background from one or many images at once!


100% free:

  • No limits on the number of images.
  • No subscription or registration is required.
  • No API key is needed.


How it works:

  1. Select one picture or a batch, or simply everything you have on canvas.
  2. Run the Background Remover from the Plugins menu.
  3. Get images without backgrounds, but with the original image size and quality.


You can also use the web version. It's free, and it works on mobile devices.
